Posts.Content: Tamoxifen is still the most effective drug against breast cancer, but just like most cancer drugs, it kills the normal fast growing cells too.  This page has the most recent findings of tamoxifen: http://www.bestmorph.com/cgi-bin/show/search/100-tamoxifen
Posts.Title: Tamoxifin

Posts.Content: I found this page with all the latest news about breast cancer , it has a lot links to the creditbale sources like NIH, WebMD, latimes, bbc ... http://www.bestmorph.com/cgi-bin/show/tags/74-breast_cancer http://www.bestmorph.com/cgi-bin/show/tags/124-menopause&nbs
Posts.Title: all the latest news about breast cancer
